name: Remx
intro: Platform for designing, selling, and collecting 3D digital wearables
introduce: remx is the go-to platform for designing, selling, and collecting 3D digital wearables for the metaverse. With only a few clicks, Remx offers creatives access to 3D models, generative art applications, AR, smart contracts, and a unique personalized NFT minting process all in one easy-to-use platform.
